scene.name: intro
scene.line: `(Confidentially.)` Don't let them catch you looking too closely, here. Not within our purview.
scene.option: We can look at something else.

scene.name: spirit-safe
scene.line: Keeps us honest in the eyes of the state. Well, in the eyes of the management, anyway ... we keep pretty well out of view down here. Not much chance of being spotted by helicopter. Hey?
But if the law came knocking, we could say we were logging and securing our virgin spirits. We could `say`.
